patterns: I wish you a merry christmas
responses: Merry Christmas, dear friend! Among all the presents I have received this year, the little token of love from you made me the happiest!
I’m glad to have you in this Christmas. Wishing you Merry Christmas. May you have a happy year.

patterns: I wish you a merry christmas

responses: I  won’t ask for much this Christmas. I won’t even wish for snow. And I’m just gonna keep on waiting, underneath the mistletoe
